title: Martha’s rule now in operation at every acute hospital in England
summary: On what would have been Martha's 18th birthday, her family celebrated the adoption of a new system allowing patients to request reviews of their care. This initiative aims to enhance patient rights and improve healthcare services. The family hopes this change will ensure better care for others experiencing similar challenges.

title: Reeves has ‘full confidence’ in Rayner, and thinks deputy PM can keep her job – UK politics live
summary: The Chancellor has publicly endorsed a colleague who made a mistake regarding stamp duty regulations. This show of support comes amid scrutiny over the error. The Chancellor emphasizes commitment to the team's integrity and accountability.

title: Adelaide v Collingwood: 2025 AFL first qualifying final – live
summary: The 2025 finals series kicks off at Adelaide Oval with a highly anticipated matchup between rising rivals. Martin Pegan is providing live updates on the action as the game unfolds. Fans can look forward to a thrilling contest as the teams compete for victory.

title: Macron says ‘Coalition of the Willing’ will finalise ‘robust’ Ukrainian security guarantees – Europe live
summary: Leaders convening in Paris are scheduled to address Donald Trump this afternoon. The discussions aim to cover key international issues. The meeting highlights ongoing global diplomatic efforts.

title: Trump seeks to reverse ruling that his trade tariffs are illegal – US politics live
summary: The President is requesting the Supreme Court to overturn a prior ruling declaring that the majority of his extensive trade tariffs were illegal. This effort seeks to reinstate his trade policies, which have faced legal challenges. The outcome could significantly impact U.S. trade relations and economic strategy.
